name: raml_exercise
description: helloworld-rs: Helloworld Using JAX-RS (Java API for RESTful Web Services) ========================================================================== Author: Gustavo A. Brey, Gaston Coco   Level: Intermediate   Technologies: CDI, JAX-RS   Summary: The `helloworld-rs` quickstart demonstrates a simple Hello World application, bundled and deployed as a WAR, that uses *JAX-RS* to say Hello.     Target Product: JBoss EAP   Source: <https://github.com/jboss-developer/jboss-eap-quickstarts/>
